product_summary: CodeComplete is an AI-powered coding assistant designed for enterprise needs. It provides a suite of tools to improve end-to-end developer workflow, including code generation, automated unit testing, automated documentation, refactoring & migrations. CodeComplete is secure, self-hosted, and fine-tuned to your coding style and institutional knowledge.
product_pros: Fine-tuned to your coding style and institutional knowledge
Provides full visibility into usage and performance
Easy to integrate with existing workflows
product_cons: May not be suitable for all programming languages or development environments
May require some customization to fit specific needs
Can be expensive for some users
May not be able to handle all coding tasks
May not be as accurate or reliable as a human developer

product_usecases.details: CodeComplete can generate full-function code suggestions based on your context, saving you time and effort.
CodeComplete can automatically generate unit tests for your code, ensuring that it is of high quality and bug-free.
CodeComplete can automatically generate documentation for your code, making it easier for others to understand and use.
CodeComplete can help you refactor your code and migrate it to new platforms or technologies.
CodeComplete allows you to ask questions about your code and get instant answers, helping you learn and debug faster.

product_toolfor.details: CodeComplete can help developers write better code, faster.
CodeComplete can help teams collaborate more effectively on code projects.
CodeComplete can help enterprises improve their software development process.
CodeComplete can help students learn to code faster and more effectively.
CodeComplete can help researchers develop new AI-powered coding tools and techniques.

product_pricing: CodeComplete offers custom pricing for enterprise users. Individual users can join the waitlist for more information.
